```{r path}
path2localfile<-"../data/"
pathoutput<-"../docs/"
species = read_excel(paste0(path2localfile,"dataLOOP.xlsx"))
```


```{r read, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, autodep=TRUE}
#generate html files in French
     for (i in 1:nrow(species)) {
  render("ScaleFR.rmd", 
         params=list(spplat=species$spplat[i], sppeng=species$sppeng[i], sex=species$sex[i], sppfr=species$sppfr[i]),
         output_file=paste0(pathoutput,"Echelle_", species$spplat[i],"_", species$sex[i], ".html"))
}
#generate html files in English
     for (i in 1:nrow(species)) {
  render("ScaleENG.rmd", 
         params=list(spplat=species$spplat[i], sppeng=species$sppeng[i], sex=species$sex[i], sppfr=species$sppfr[i]),
         output_file=paste0(pathoutput,"Scale_", species$spplat[i],"_", species$sex[i], ".html"))
}
```
